item.title: Aspose.Words for SharePoint 4.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.Words for SharePoint 4.0.0 Release Notes Major features Key Summary Category WORDSSP-238 Investigate if SharePoint 2016 is fully supported Feature So this release includes full support of SharePoint 2016 as major update. Other changes This release includes the latest improvements and fixes made up to date in Aspose.Words for .NET (v15.x.x). Also please note EULA update .
